pylossmap.blm_type_map¶

BLM name to type mapping.

Module Contents¶

pylossmap.blm_type_map.TYPE_MAP[source]¶
pylossmap.blm_type_map.name_to_type(name, on_fail='other')[source]¶

Converts find the type corresponding a given BLM name.

Parameters

  • name (str) – BLM name.

  • on_fail (str, optional) – returned if not BLM type is found.

Returns

the BLM type or “on_fail” if no BLM type is found.

Return type

str
